title: Passport to Eternity
description: Early collection of stories by the renowned author. INCLUDES: The Man on the 99th Floor (1962); Thirteen to Centaurus (1962); Track 12 (1958); The Watch-Towers (1962); A Question of Re-Entry (1963); Escapement (1956); The Thousand Dreams of Stellavista (1962); The Cage of Sand (1962); Passport to Eternity (1962).
author: J.G. Ballard
